Boker Arbolito Stamigo Knife and Fork Outdoor Dining Set (Stag Handle) Leather Sheath 03BA501HH

MANUFACTURER: Boker Arbolito Knives
SKU: BK-03BA501HH  MPN: 03BA501HH
Retail Price: $132.95
Our Price:

RELATED CATEGORIES

Customer Reviews:
(1 Reviews)

Read Reviews | Write a Review
DescriptionReviewsTell a Friend

Boker 03BA501HH Stamigo Knife & Fork Set, Stag Handle, Leather Sheath. The Boker Fork and Knife Set features a hollow ground drop point blade made of 440A stainless steel with full tang construction. The handles have carefully selected genuine stag scales which are fastened to the tang with brass pins. The knife has a stainless steel guard and a lanyard hole. A custom genuine leather sheath is included. Overall length: 7.875.
